title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mackinac Island, Michigan
content:
Photo submitted by Doug McKibbon, “My friends and I rode across the frozen Lake Huron (aka the ice bridge) to Mackinac Island. Photo credit: Jamie Smith.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers aroundÂ the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send […]
